previewArticle.title: Switzerland vs. Ecuador: World Cup | Group E Preview

recapArticle.title: Switzerland 2, Ecuador 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group E Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Corner,  Ecuador. Conceded by Steve Von Bergen.

timelineItems.name: #WorldCup Coverage
timelineItems.text: 1' We are underway! #WorldCup #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Brandon Badgeley
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup2014 Predictions: #SUIvsECU SUI win #FRAvsHON FRA win #ARGvsBIH ARG win

timelineItems.comment: Gökhan Inler (Switzerland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juan Carlos Paredes (Ecuador).
Xherdan Shaqiri (Switzerland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Carlos Gruezo (Ecuador).

timelineItems.name: nikki m
timelineItems.text: that was some good passing from the swiss #suivsecu

timelineItems.name: Bolt VanDerHuge
timelineItems.text: The Swiss look sloppy. 2-1 to Ecuador at this rate. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Granit Xhaka (Switzerland) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Valon Behrami.

timelineItems.name: Brasil 2014
timelineItems.text: 0-10' min. Switzerland is better. But no real chances yet. #SUIvsECU #SUIECU #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ecuador. Jorge Guagua tries a through ball, but Felipe Caicedo is caught offside.
Foul by Walter Ayoví (Ecuador).
Xherdan Shaqiri (Switzerland) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Drmic looking lively thus far...Lichtsteiner doing well on the overlap...#SUI must still be mindful of the counter attack...#SUIvECU

timelineItems.name: Aulstin Gardiner
timelineItems.text: I dont think Switzerland has a chance against Ecuador, but they have had a few opportunities and shots. #WorldCup #WorldCup2014 #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Xherdan Shaqiri (Switzerland) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gökhan Inler.

timelineItems.name: footyindia
timelineItems.text: 13 mins: Granit Xhaka, hammers a 30-yarder over the bar. #SUIECU #SUIvsECU #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Carlos Gruezo (Ecuador).
Granit Xhaka (Switzerland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Antonio Valencia (Ecuador) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jefferson Montero.
Attempt saved. Ricardo Rodriguez (Switzerland) left footed shot from long range on the left is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Gökhan Inler.
Corner,  Switzerland. Conceded by Alexander Domínguez.

timelineItems.name: Niko Temofeew
timelineItems.text: 15 minutes have passed and not much to talk about. The Swiss with one decent chance on goal #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Switzerland 2, Ecuador 1.

timelineItems.name: Chris Kane
timelineItems.text: What a finish to #SUIvsECU. End to end action. Great use of the advantage law by the ref to keep the play going.

timelineItems.name: David Cyment
timelineItems.text: Switzerland apparently doesn't want to hear about neutrality... scores in the final minutes of stoppage! #SUIvsECU #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Luis Aleman
timelineItems.text: That Swiss counterattack though. #SUIvsECU 2-1at the last 20 seconds of stoppage time

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Switzerland wins in stoppage time. 9 opening games without a draw is the most at a #WorldCup since 1934.

timelineItems.name: Michael Raymond
timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU what an epic battle in the last minutes to score the winning goal!

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: Well worth the 91+ minutes of boredom. #SUIvECU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: With the last kick of the match #SUI tops #ECU 2-1. Wow. Match Stats: http://t.co/J5WXvaR3H5 #SUIvECU

timelineItems.name: Iain
timelineItems.text: FULL-TIME Switzerland 2 (Mehmedi 48, Sefenovic 93), Ecuador 1 (E Valencia 22). #SUIvsECU #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Richard Steel
timelineItems.text: That's what you call a counter attack! From one end to the other in 10 seconds to win the game #SUIvECU #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Van Gaal's NoteBook
timelineItems.text: Hitzfield has some magic when it comes to substitutions..always impacting. Juve know too well about that. Re Lars Ricken #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Ylli Y Tixhaj
timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU Allowing the play to go on when Behrami went down was the best call from a referee this world cup.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Teams scoring first have lost 5 of 9 games at this #WorldCup. They lost a total of 3 times in 2010.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Haris Seferovic's goal for Switzerland is the latest game-winner ever in the #WorldCup group stage.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Haris Seferovic's goal for Switzerland is the latest game-winner ever in the #WorldCup group stage (90'+3).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Busy #WorldCup day ahead: Netherlands & Chile could advance. Spain (!) is 1 of 4 teams that could be eliminated.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: [GIF] #SUI's last-gasp, stoppage time winner: http://t.co/ZOoZfHT6yi #SUIvECU http://t.co/fR3Wtbt1GI

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: [GIF] #SUI's last-gasp, stoppage time winner: http://t.co/ZOoZfHT6yi #SUIvECU http://t.co/fR3Wtbt1GI

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Brazil had been 17-0-0 at the #WorldCup vs non-UEFA/CONMEBOL teams, outscoring them 50-5.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: AUS-NED: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN ESP-CHI, 2:30 ET, ESPN CMR-CRO, 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: France has converted all 10 of its #WorldCup penalties. 1st French goal in a WC opener since 1998.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Five Aside's recap of yesterday's #WorldCup action. Messi, Benzema, late winners: http://t.co/ZqWU1NZZ9t

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Karim Benzema is the first Frenchman with two goals in a #WorldCup game since Zinedine Zidane in the 1998 final.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Exciting #WorldCup so far. 10 of 11 games have had 3+ goals, & only one half hasn't had a goal (MEX-CMR 1st).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Final: France 3, Honduras 0. France wins #WorldCup opener for 1st time since 1998 (when France won the title).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: GER-POR; 11:30 AM ET, ESPN IRN-NGA: 2:30 ET, ESPN GHA-USA: 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Tim Cahill has five career #WorldCup goals. All other Australians have a total of five.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 49 goals so far at the World Cup, most through 17 #WorldCup games since 1958.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Sead Kolasinac has scored the fastest own goal in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Sead Kolasinac has scored the fastest own goal in #WorldCup history (3').

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Arjen Robben now has six career #WorldCup goals. Johnny Rep is the only Dutchman with more (7).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Argentina is 26-1-0 when leading at half in the #WorldCup. Only loss: 1930 final vs Uruguay.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany-Portugal kicks off the day. Germany will be the first country to play 100 #WorldCup games.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Portugal is 1-8-0 when conceding first at #WorldCup. Only win: 1966 vs North Korea (after trailing 3-0).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany has converted 11 of 13 #WorldCup penalties. Only Spain has scored more (15 of 17).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Final: Argentina 2, Bosnia-Herz. 1. Argentina has won six straight #WorldCup openers.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 37 goals scored thus far at the #WorldCup, most through 11 World Cup games since 1958.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Thomas Müller has seven goals in seven career #WorldCup games. And he's 24.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Five Aside's recap of today's #WorldCup games includes Messi, Benzema & World Cup records: http://t.co/fnWj4tnHDJ

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Thomas Müller scores Germany's first #WorldCup hat trick since Miroslav Klose in 2002.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany is the first country to score at least four goals in four straight #WorldCup openers.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany has won seven straight #WorldCup openers by a combined score of 27-3.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Portugal loses 4-0 to Germany, the worst loss in Portugal's #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: No draws in 12 opening World Cup games this year. First time that's happened since the first #WorldCup in 1930.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Final: Iran 0, Nigeria 0. First draw of the 2014 #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: BEL-ALG: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN BRA-MEX: 2:30 ET, ESPN RUS-KOR: 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Tim Howard led #USMNT with 33 touches in the first half. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: FIFA officially clocks Clint Dempsey's goal at 34 seconds, the 6th-fastest goal in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: FIFA now clocks Clint Dempsey's goal at 30 seconds, still the 5th-fastest goal in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 21-year-old John Brooks is the youngest American to score a #WorldCup goal since Landon Donovan in 2002.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Algeria leads at halftime for the second time at the #WorldCup, first since 1982 vs Chile (Algeria won 3-2).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT made 45 clearances against Ghana, most by any team in a #WorldCup game since 1966 (our whole data set).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: FIFA now says Clint Dempsey's goal came 29 seconds in, making it the 5th-fastest goal in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Belgium is the 6th team to win after conceding 1st at this #WorldCup. It happened 3 times in the entire 2010 WC.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: There have been three scoreless first halves at this #WorldCup. Mexico has played two of them.

timelineItems.name: Owen Gohl
timelineItems.text: There's so many open seats at this #SUIvsECU game, it looks like a #crew96 match.

timelineItems.name: lovefutból hateFIFA

timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU a fair few empty seats what a shame #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.text: Swiss need to stop putting so much power behind their passes. Leading their passes too much, players can't keep up. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Christopher
timelineItems.text: For arguably their greatest player ever, Antonio Valencia has had very little influence on this game. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: DANIEL BOYA
timelineItems.text: This game needs some individual brilliance #SUIvsECU #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jefferson Montero (Ecuador) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Felipe Caicedo.
Corner,  Ecuador. Conceded by Diego Benaglio.

timelineItems.name: Samuel Chamberlain
timelineItems.text: Not calling my dad until this game is over. The best part is, he'll understand completely. #WorldCup2014 #FathersDay #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ecuador. Christian Noboa tries a through ball, but Frickson Erazo is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Another set piece. Admir Mehmedi levels it for #SUI: http://t.co/BE6hQrYJRU #SUIvECU http://t.co/wAUmOuDbdg

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Another set piece. Admir Mehmedi levels it for #SUI: http://t.co/BE6hQrYJRU #SUIvECU http://t.co/wAUmOuDbdg

timelineItems.name: Harmeet Singh
timelineItems.text: Having confusion between swiss fans and empty seats �� #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Eric Sandberg
timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU It would be nice if Switzerland wins because Roger Federer won today also. A double victory for Switzerland.

timelineItems.name: footyindia
timelineItems.text: 64 mins: Some scrappy spell here, with the action contained in the middle barring very occasional optimistic long-range shots. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: The Beautiful Game
timelineItems.text: Most depressing part about the empty seats is that an #ecuador game in the US would sell out in a day #worldcup #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Granit Xhaka (Switzerland) left footed shot from more than 35 yards is blocked. Assisted by Xherdan Shaqiri.

timelineItems.name: Steven Torpy
timelineItems.text: I would like a draw for #SUIvsECU, but I rooting for Ecuador for what happened last year and the students at K-State.

timelineItems.comment: Steve Von Bergen (Switzerland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Enner Valencia (Ecuador).

timelineItems.name: DesmondBrunoMalaysia
timelineItems.text: Ecuador was unbeaten at home in #WorldCup qualifying but winless on road. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Akhil Arora
timelineItems.text: Match #9 of the #WorldCup, #SUIvsECU! Hoping for a cracker here. #SUI have a good squad this time.

timelineItems.name: Ira Alif Syabil
timelineItems.text: HOWLER...WAIT OFFSIDE! #Drama #SUIvECU #SUIECU

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Switzerland. Ricardo Rodriguez tries a through ball, but Josip Drmic is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sam
timelineItems.text: #SUI think they make it 2-1 through Drmic only for it to disallowed for offside! #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: ThatSoccerFagIrbin⚽
timelineItems.text: Ref how did you see that offside you can barley open your eyes #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: The Beautiful Game
timelineItems.text: Neither team doing much in the midfield #worldcup #SUIvsECU but #ecuador is giving up huge space now

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Xherdan Shaqiri (Switzerland) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Admir Mehmedi.

timelineItems.name: Rooney's Neck Hair
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup2014 is going to set a record for disallowed goals - refs blew that one!! #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Chavez
timelineItems.text: Switzerland gets a goal taken away and Ecuador making a good change. Caeicedo was ball watching as it was being passed to him #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: UFA
timelineItems.text: Switzerland is very disappointing. First bad game of the World Cup. No creativity in this game and very sloppy play. #SUIvECU #groupoflife

timelineItems.name: Sky Sports Football
timelineItems.text: Here is the moment Mehmedi put #SUI level. Both sides are looking threatening. Who wins? #SUIvsECU http://t.co/vRKBvcQPHp

timelineItems.name: Sky Sports Football
timelineItems.text: Here is the moment Mehmedi put #SUI level. Both sides are looking threatening. Who wins? #SUIvsECU http://t.co/vRKBvcQPHp

timelineItems.name: Shaun Beirne
timelineItems.text: 100% goal disallowed but can't complain about stuffing up simple 3v1. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: footyindia
timelineItems.text: 75 mins: Replay of the disallowed goal, and it was a horrible decision. Drmic was onside when the ball was played. #SUIvsECU #Fifa #mafifa

timelineItems.name: David Matthews
timelineItems.text: Got a feeling #SWI vs. #ECU could be the first snooze match of the tournament. Hope I'm wrong however!

timelineItems.name: Tim Barnett
timelineItems.text: This #SUI side render me mildly excited..and I ain't no pushover. The darkhorse no-one's riding. #giddyup #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Very curious to see how #SUI deal with the potential weather conditions that #ECU are far more used to - however, no altitude #SUIvECU

timelineItems.name: Francis Mutegi
timelineItems.text: TEAM NEWS! #SUI Benaglio, Lichtsteiner, Von Bergen, Djourou, Rodriguez, Inler, Xhaka,Behrami,Stocker, Drmic, Shaqiri. #SUIvECU #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: James
timelineItems.text: Turn offside off. #moregoalsplease #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Chris Rourke
timelineItems.text: Never in a million year would I watch Switzerland v Ecuador but because it's the #WorldCup I'm all over it! #SUIvECU

timelineItems.name: Paulo Henrique™ ✌
timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU #SUI #ECU (@ Estádio Nacional de Brasília Mané Garrincha) http://t.co/k30RY09sOo http://t.co/04ZpOXoTJD

timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU #SUI #ECU (@ Estádio Nacional de Brasília Mané Garrincha) http://t.co/k30RY09sOo http://t.co/04ZpOXoTJD

timelineItems.name: Hari Sethi
timelineItems.text: Excited to see Switzerland today. An excellent defensive side with young attacking players to keep an eye on too. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: daniel_thecuban
timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU walking onto the field #SUI #ECU #WorldCup2014 #worldcup14 #wc14 #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Jiong Wang
timelineItems.text: Nothing shows how international @twitter is better than #worldcup! #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Rob
timelineItems.text: Swiss have some class players #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: adam
timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU should he starting soon my prediction is #SUI 1-1#ECU however I wouldn't rule out one of the teams taking a #goal lead!

timelineItems.name: Chris Cooper
timelineItems.text: Come on Switzerland! If you can beat Spain in the 2010 opener, you can beat Ecuador! #WorldCup2014 #SUIvsECU #Brasil2014

timelineItems.name: Vladimir Novakovic
timelineItems.text: Once upon a time I regarded Diego Benaglio great prospect. Though good, he never quite lived up to my expactations. #SUIvsECU #B92Brazil

timelineItems.name: Eric Bucad
timelineItems.text: A stat just popped up during #SUIvECU: #ECU have logged almost 80 km on the pitch, #SUI 90+. When averaged out, that's a lot of mileage.

timelineItems.comment: Xherdan Shaqiri (Switzerland) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Christian Noboa (Ecuador).

timelineItems.name: Mooney
timelineItems.text: For a team trained in high altitude conditions, the Ecuadorans are sorely lacking in match fitness #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Lauren Moore
timelineItems.text: I love all the people complaining about offsides when 90% don't even know the rules for what is onside and not onside #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Xherdan Shaqiri (Switzerland) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Valon Behrami.
Foul by Xherdan Shaqiri (Switzerland).
Antonio Valencia (Ecuador) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: J. Patton
timelineItems.text: The Swiss have to complete the final pass eventually, right? #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.text: Estádio Nacional Mané Garrincha. #SUIvECU http://t.co/xNtL98fa3F

timelineItems.text: Estádio Nacional Mané Garrincha. #SUIvECU http://t.co/xNtL98fa3F

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ecuador. Christian Noboa tries a through ball, but Joao Rojas is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Roughly 8 minutes in stoppage time.. Will Switzerland be able to duplicate what Ivory Coast did last night? #SUIvECU

timelineItems.name: Latin Americanist
timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU Uh-oh. Free kick for #SUI from 20m out. But it's all for nought as the shot hits #Ecuador wall. 1-1. 82'.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Johan Djourou (Switzerland).
Enner Valencia (Ecuador) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Sonja
timelineItems.text: Rodriguez slightly looks like he wants to cry, but that's just how he always looks, don't worry xD #sui #SUIvsECU #wc14

timelineItems.name: Brian B.
timelineItems.text: I swore the ref reached into his back pocket there. He's lucky that's not a red. #SUI #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.comment: Michael Arroyo (Ecuador) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Valon Behrami (Switzerland).

timelineItems.name: Sean Sequeira
timelineItems.text: #SUIvsECU the amount of offside goals this world cup is damn tooo high #FIFAWorldCupBrazil

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Michael Arroyo (Ecuador) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Foul by Antonio Valencia (Ecuador).
Ricardo Rodriguez (Switzerland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Annie Rivadeneira
timelineItems.text: Alright Ecuador this is your time to get another point! #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Morgan Carlston
timelineItems.text: This ref keeps throwing picks, blocking players from where they want to go. Strange to see at this level of match #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Footy Doctrine
timelineItems.text: Ball deflected towards the net but Swiss goalkeeper recovers in time to avoid it from going into the net. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Nonso
timelineItems.text: ...Lookin' like it's gonna be the 1st match to end in a draw in this 2014 Fifa World Cup. #SUIvsECU #Brazil2014...

timelineItems.name: Ryan Bolling
timelineItems.text: That was a cool free kick. Slight deflection. Change in direction. Science is crazy! #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: BellesoftheBallgame
timelineItems.text: Are we going to have our first tie in #WorldCup2014? Here's hoping Ecuador can pull it out. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Suprio Guha Thakurta
timelineItems.text: Is Antonio Valencia not fit. He is strolling around. Would have thought he would be leading the attack from the right #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: CCN TV6
timelineItems.text: What's your prediction for today's #WorldCup encounter between #SUIvsECU Switzerland vs Ecuador? @TV6FanZone

timelineItems.comment: Stephan Lichtsteiner (Switzerland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Joao Rojas (Ecuador).

timelineItems.name: Abhi Kris
timelineItems.text: So this is what a game with two counter-attacking sides looks like. Neither of them wants to take charge #WorldCup #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Sarah
timelineItems.text: Just because your cheese works well with a bunch of holes doesn't mean your defence will, Switzerland. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: ESPN Stats & Info
timelineItems.text: None of the 9 games in this year's World Cup have ended in a tie. #SUIvsECU could be the 1st with 3 minutes left to play.

timelineItems.name: Joshua A Cunard
timelineItems.text: I don't understand why wasn't Antonio valencia played on the right wing where he could have caused real damage. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Podge
timelineItems.text: Crowd getting excited at prospect of not having to sit through any more of this rubbish #SUIvsECU #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: DON'T READ MY BIO
timelineItems.text: Euador players aren't playing together at all, being so individual in approach #SUIvsECU #UltimateSports

timelineItems.name: The_Lutfi
timelineItems.text: Two relatively neutral teams about to produce a relative neutral result #WorldCup2014 #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Ææmįr || عامر ™
timelineItems.text: Switzerland and Ecuador are really playing the game like cats and dogs chasing each other , each of them are hungry #worldcup #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Bryan Deloeste
timelineItems.text: Both teams are desperate break the equalizer. I love the intensity #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Pundog Millionaire
timelineItems.text: OMG this game is depressing! How can #WorldCup football be so boring and have such a lack of quality?!? Worst game so far #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: James Starks
timelineItems.text: And that's exactly what happens when you hesitate. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Nathan McDonald
timelineItems.text: The perfect counter attack from Switzerland! #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: RR
timelineItems.text: Wow last 30 seconds!! Props to them! Ecuador had a chance to win it too! Just seconds before. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Iggy
timelineItems.text: Damn. I’m rooting for Ecuador, but that was great momentum change and a sweet goal by the Swiss. #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #SUI, with what could be the last kick of the match, go 2-1 up: http://t.co/r5OPvKZ6oa #SUIvECU

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Switzerland 2, Ecuador 1.

timelineItems.name: Da Boss
timelineItems.text: SAY CHEEESE!!! #SUIvsECU

timelineItems.name: Road2Rio
timelineItems.text: GOALLLLLL!!!!!! Beautiful goal by Switzerland! SUI 2-1 ECU #road2rio #WC2014 #SUIvsECU
